item.title: How to edit item stats? Please help
item.dc:creator: @xplicitscape xplicitscape
item.description:
@xplicitscape wrote:

Its Silabgarza v6 lol. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2008, 06:38:22 pm[/size][hr][quote=“eolia123, post:2, topic:235916”]first we need more information, a.k.a. what source? if its a usual one go to it then go to config then look for item.cfg, right click it then open with then choose notepad or wordpad… press ctrl+f type in the items name (ex. Rune_Scimitar) then scroll over and theres your stats, usually if u scroll all the way up itll tell u the order of them…

if this is confusing repost and ill “simplify” it[/quote]
btw im not neccasarily sure what to do. Cuz i wanna edit the stats like strength.
Then i simply want to learn step by step plz thx.

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit item stats? Please help

item.title: How to edit item stats? Please help
item.dc:creator: @eolia123 eolia123
item.description:
@eolia123 wrote:

first we need more information, a.k.a. what source? if its a usual one go to it then go to config then look for item.cfg, right click it then open with then choose notepad or wordpad… press ctrl+f type in the items name (ex. Rune_Scimitar) then scroll over and theres your stats, usually if u scroll all the way up itll tell u the order of them…

if this is confusing repost and ill “simplify” it

Read full topic
